title: (x) GTA Chinatown Wars Ingame Display Font - Osaka Sans Serif {Mike Y}
content:
I'm looking for the display font used in GTA: Chinatown Wars.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164414im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chinatownwars_psp_dealer_6267.jpg)
  
"$125" in upperleft corner

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164414im_/http:/typophile.com/files/grand-theft-auto%20-chinatown-wars-PSP-ss-5_5720.jpg)
  
"176" and "GREAT!" in upperleft corner

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164414im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Grand-Theft-Auto--Chinatown-Wars-Heading-to-PSP-5_5949.jpg)
  
"The Triangle" in bottom right corner

Thanks in advance.

Kind regards,  
Martijn
author: Martijn van Berkel

comments.content:
It's a freebie by Vic Fieger called [Osaka Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164414/http:/www.dafont.com/osaka-sans-serif.font?nb_ppp=50&text=THE+TRIANGLE).

- Mike Yanega

Thanks for your answer. :)

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel
